      • mutationFunction

        protected void mutationFunction(float severity,
                                float probability,
                                int method)
        Description copied from class: AbstractRepresentation
        Specific implementation of the mutation function that modifies this representation based on the provided parameters.
        Specified by:
        mutationFunction in class AbstractRepresentation
        Parameters:
        severity - Should be between 0..1, interpreted by the representation.
        probability - Should be between 0..1, probability for one genome to be mutated.
        method - Selected mutation method. Use AbstractRepresentation.getNumberofMutationFunctions() to obtain the number of implemented methods.
